entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow mixed with ice pellets ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
